Headline: Temporary Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan Reroute near 31st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted near 31st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, Millard, 32nd, Central Park, 31st, and resume normal route due to, street blockage near 31st/Lawndale.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Chicago/LaSalle
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago rr EB via Chicago, Wells, Grand, Milwaukee & Chicago; WB via Chicago, Sedgwick, Superior, Wells & Chicago, due to police activity nr Chicago/LaSalle

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Chicago/LaSalle.

Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, Wells, Grand, Milwaukee, then resume normal route on Chicago.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, Sedgwick, Superior, Wells, then resume normal route on Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #62 Archer Reroute at State/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted near State/Roosevelt

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Polk, Clark, Roosevelt, State, and resume regular route, due to street blockage near State/Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Polk, Clark, Roosevelt, State, and resume  regular route, due to street blockage near State/Roosevelt.
